name: Zombie Panic in Wonderland
overview: A frantic third-person shooter with large doses of humor. A sudden wave of zombies is attacking Wonderland. To save his friends from the spell of the “amorous zombies”, machine gun in hand, the player will have to solve the mystery of the “scented dwarves” in time and put an end to the evil power hidden in the castle in the northern city. Cut scenes, music with lyrics, seven playable characters, hidden levels, final bosses, different weapons, lots of zombies attacking you at all times, explosions, demolitions, fire ...
